41c24257-d7fc-4654-8b46-c2666dc5b56d.description: set per level shared state variable
41c24257-d7fc-4654-8b46-c2666dc5b56d.name: level
script: sharedState.put('level' + level + 'Value', 'Level ' + level + ': This is a longer string value set at each level of the nested journeys. It contains an indicator in which level it was set.');
